channel.title: Ransomware on Josh Stepp
channel.description: Recent content in Ransomware on Josh Stepp

item.title: Ransomware: The New Massively Disruptive Market?
item.description: Ransomware, malicious software designed to encrypt a victimâ€™s hard drive and charge a ransom for the recovered files, has been reigning terror or organizations and users for a number of years now. The business model has always been simple, infect the user through spam e-mail or other vectors of infection (i.e. online droppers), encrypt the hard drive and hold it hostage until the user pays the ransom in Bitcoin. Rinse and repeat.
